description: Permutation of natural numbers: maps the fractions A038567/A038566 to the right side (n/m > 1) of Stern-Brocot tree.
links: Index entries for sequences related to Stern's sequences
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
maple: A038567_A038566_to_SternBrocot_permutation := proc(u) local a,n,i; a := []; for n from 1 to u do for i from 1 to n do if (1 = igcd(n,i)) then a := [op(a),cfrac2binexp(convert((n/i),confrac))+1]; fi; od; od; RETURN(a); end; # cfrac2binexp given in A054424.
author: Antti Karttunen
